ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisOrder (a) designating the Minister of Human Resources and Skills Development as the appropriate Minister with respect to the CANADIAN CENTRE FOR OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY for the purposes of the Financial Administration Act; and (b) repealing Order in Council P.C. 1998-2029; effective July 20, 2004.
